entities.description: Extent to which the COVID-19 pandemic has negatively affected the respondent's emotional or mental health.
Extent to which the COVID-19 pandemic has affected the respondent's alcohol consumption.
Extent to which the COVID-19 pandemic has affected the respondent's drug use other than alcohol.
Frequency of experiencing serious financial worries due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

relationships.description: Connects the COVID-19 pandemic to its negative impact on mental health.
Indicates the increase or change in alcohol consumption due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Indicates the increase or change in drug use other than alcohol due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Connects the COVID-19 pandemic to the frequency of serious financial worries.
